meanings.definition: A round ball used in the sport of basketball.
meanings.sent1: During the game, players dribble basketballs down the court.
meanings.sent2: Kids enjoy shooting hoops with their basketballs at the park.
meanings.sent3: The basketballs bounced merrily on the gym floor during practice.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed like basketballs bouncing in an empty gym.
meanings.sent5: The shiny basketballs gleamed under the bright gym lights.

meanings.definition: A game played with a basketball.
meanings.sent1: Fans cheered loudly as the teams played basketball with skill.
meanings.sent2: He practiced shooting hoops to improve his basketball game.
meanings.sent3: The basketball game turned into a friendly competition among friends.
meanings.sent4: Life can sometimes feel like a fast-paced basketball game.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of the basketball game filled the arena.

meanings.definition: A container used for holding or carrying basketballs.
meanings.sent1: The coach carried the basketballs in a large bag to practice.
meanings.sent2: The equipment room had shelves full of basketballs in containers.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy knocked over the container of basketballs.
meanings.sent4: Her backpack felt as heavy as a container full of basketballs.
meanings.sent5: The container for basketballs had a convenient handle for easy transport.
